name: Dukey Run
description:
Use a combination of WASD and the mouse in order to control and accelerate the character through 10 levels of tightly balanced gameplay. 

Credits: 

Martin Cordero - Game Design / Programming

Julien Camaraza - 3D Generalist / Level Design

Sean Hentschel - UX/Level Design

Ruben Ruiz Velasco - UX/ Programming/ Beer Guzzling

Joseph Marrero - UI Design / UX
